channel.title: Gauntlet Comics - More 1%er Supers in April!
channel.description:
In April, I'm planning on releasing 1%er Supers for publication! To celebrate its release, I'd like to run it for y'all on Wednesday nights, starting at 9PM Eastern
S1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYUvoxuuY8-q7qj769Z S2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYUvs3U5RKB_35RmW8j S3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYUvuNE7xkTEBfK771f S4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYUvxntraoKeLg1JKIj

item.title: Gauntlet Comics - More 1%er Supers in April!
item.dc:creator: @shane
item.description:
@shane wrote:

FYI in the composition box there is a little cog wheel. From there you can insert dates and times that will show up properly for viewers depending on their time zone, ala:

2019-02-15T01:49:00Z

Read full topic
item.source: Gauntlet Comics - More 1%er Supers in April!
